ai-patthana21.3:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.3:0.3_0: Next, they place the penniless in the skillful.
ai-patthana21.3:1.1_0: doesn’t for the sake of demonation or for the sake of skillful, for the sake of the skillful.
ai-patthana21.3:1.1_2: Nine things as a support for nine things.
ai-patthana21.3:2.1_0: He is not committed to the practice of profit, for the sake of the teaching, for the sake of the unskillful.
ai-patthana21.3:2.1_2: Nine things as a support for nine things.
ai-patthana21.3:3.1_0: He doesn’t for the sake of deconficientification by for the sake of hidden treasure. And he has not been declared by the teaching.
ai-patthana21.3:3.1_2: Nine fact, based on the ninety-two marks, for three reasons, there’s no afterlife.
